sentences.sContent: We can get the most wonderful red clams, eels and frogs' legs, kingfish, turbot and live hamachi (yellowtail tuna).
sentences.sContent_eng: We can get the most wonderful red clams, eels and frogs' legs, kingfish, turbot and live hamachi (yellowtail tuna).
sentences.sCn: 我们可以得到最上乘的蛤蜊、鳝鱼、田鸡腿、无鳔石首鱼、大比目鱼和活油甘鱼（黄色尾巴的金枪鱼）。

sentences.sContent: FLATFISH: Low sales for turbot during the past months have led to a price drop. Moreover, substitute products are still showing lower prices when compared with turbot.
sentences.sContent_eng: FLATFISH: Low sales for turbot during the past months have led to a price drop. Moreover, substitute products are still showing lower prices when compared with turbot.
sentences.sCn: 鲽鱼：大菱前几个月交易量偏低，导致价格下降。而且，一些可替代产品在与大菱的竞争中又降低了价格。
